title: Ayakashi
synopsis: As a child, Yuu Kusaka made a vow upon a shooting star that he would stand on the side of justice and defend the weak. However, the death of one of his friends robs him of the desire to live up to that vow, and he turns a blind eye to the misery of others, using the mysterious power he possesses as a means of making money instead of helping those in need. His days of living only for himself continue, until he's forced to fight for his life against another classmate with powers similar to his. He's saved by a mysterious girl named Eimu Yoake, who also has strange powers.
characters: ['Yoake, Eimu', 'Kusaka, Yuu', 'Kare', 'Asakura, Pam Werne', 'Yoake, Akino', 'Makihara, Izumi', 'Natsuhara, Orie', 'Yakushiji, Hime']
